attributes.action: Allow Indian National to Switch to a Tier 2 category in the UK amidst COVID19
attributes.additional_details: Due to COVD19 situation, India has stopped flights from UK and and in due course UK might also close boarders, hence I request government to extend the provision given to Chinese national to Indian too so that Indian nationals can exceptionally apply to switch from a Tier 2 Intra-company Transfer to a Tier 2 General VISA from within the UK.
attributes.background: If the Indian national in the UK on a Tier 2 Intra-Company Transfer visa and want to switch to a Tier 2 General visa then normally they need to return to India to make your application. Government can exceptionally allow them to apply within UK

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that any foreign national whose current visa expires by the end of May can apply to switch to a long-term visa from inside the UK, even where you would usually need to apply for a visa from your home country: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-advice-for-uk-visa-applicants-and-temporary-uk-residents#inside-UK

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
